title: Solitaire Crime Stories
description: Solitaire Crime Stories is a casual solitaire game where you delve into the mysteries of Springdale, a seemingly tranquil town hiding dark secrets. Join journalist Lana Whitt and her assistant Bill as you solve crimes by mastering Solitaire. Explore unique locations, meet intriguing characters, and unravel the town's enigmatic puzzles. Plus, enjoy bonding with Max, the adorable kitten companion, in between investigations. Ready to become a Solitaire master and detective extraordinaire?
